mapper.select: select count(*) from(select user.user_name,user.user_email,user.user_totaddress,user.user_phone,membership.mem_grade,membership.mem_start_date from user join membership on user.user_id = membership.user_id) mem where user_name like'%${mem_text}%' or user_email like'%${mem_text}%' or user_totaddress like'%${mem_text}%' or user_phone like'%${mem_text}%' or mem_grade like'%${mem_text}%' or mem_start_date like'%${mem_text}%'

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from(select user.user_name,user.user_email,user.user_totaddress,user.user_phone,membership.mem_grade,membership.mem_start_date from user join membership on user.user_id = membership.user_id where user_name like'%${mem_text}%' or user_email like'%${mem_text}%' or user_totaddress like'%${mem_text}%' or user_phone like'%${mem_text}%' or mem_grade like'%${mem_text}%' or mem_start_date like'%${mem_text}%' order by user.user_id desc, membership.mem_start_date asc) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
select count(*) from(select prod_title, prod_name, prod_price from product)pro where prod_name like'%${search_prod}%' or prod_title like'%${search_prod}%' or prod_price like'%${search_prod}%'

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from(select prod_num ,prod_title, prod_name, prod_price from product where prod_name like'%${search_prod}%' or prod_title like'%${search_prod}%' or prod_price like'%${search_prod}%') tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
mapper.update: update product set prod_title=#{prod_title}, prod_category=#{prod_category}, prod_name=#{prod_name}, prod_price=#{prod_price}, prod_solo=#{prod_solo}, prod_content=#{prod_content} where prod_num=#{prod_num}
